metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer
o Scramble eggs in the same pan.
o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food
o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices.

sub_section_analysis.refined_text: o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer for 20 minutes. Bratkartoffeln (Fried Potatoes) • Ingredients: o 4 potatoes o 1 small onion o 1/4 cup bacon o 2 tablespoons butter o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper • Instructions: o Boil potatoes until tender, then slice. Briam • Ingredients: o 2 potatoes o 2 zucchinis o 2 eggplants o 2 tomatoes o 1 small onion o 4 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon oregano o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper • Instructions: o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).

o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor. o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix flour, butter, water, and beaten egg to form a dough, then let rest. o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped olives, and raisins with cumin, paprika, and salt until cooked. Escalivada • Ingredients: o 2 eggplants o 2 bell peppers o 2 tomatoes o 1 small onion o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Falafel • Ingredients: o 1 can chickpeas o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup parsley o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup flour o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Drain and rinse chickpeas.

Pajeon (Pancakes) • Ingredients: o 1 cup flour o 1 cup water o 1 egg o 1/2 cup green onions o 1/2 cup seafood (optional) o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 tablespoon sesame oil • Instructions: o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl. Pan con Tomate • Ingredients: o 1 baguette o 4 tomatoes o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Slice baguette and toast until golden. Paneer Tikka • Ingredients: o 1 pound paneer o 1/2 cup yogurt o 1 tablespoon lemon juice o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon turmeric

o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. Nom Du Du (Green Papaya Salad) • Ingredients: o 1 green papaya o 2 carrots o 1/4 cup peanuts o 1/4 cup cilantro o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 2 tablespoons lime juice o 1 tablespoon sugar o 1-2 Thai chilies • Instructions: o Peel and shred green papaya and carrots. o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture, yogurt, and melted butter. Nuoc Cham • Ingredients: o 1/4 cup fish sauce o 1/4 cup lime juice o 2 tablespoons sugar Naan • Ingredients: o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast o 1 teaspoon sugar o 1/2 cup warm water o 2 1/2 cups flour o 1/2 cup yogurt o 1/4 cup melted butter o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy.

Cha Gio • Ingredients: o 1 package spring roll wrappers o 1/2 pound ground pork o 1/2 cup shrimp o 1/2 cup mushrooms o 1/4 cup carrots o 1/4 cup green onions o 2 cloves garlic o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 1 tablespoon sugar o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, julienned carrots, chopped green onions, minced garlic, fish sauce, and sugar in a bowl. o 1 small onion o 2 tomatoes o 1 jalapeño o 1/4 cup cilantro o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Dice fish or shrimp and place in a bowl. Chakchouka • Ingredients: o 4 tomatoes o 2 bell peppers o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon salt o 4 eggs o 1/4 cup cilantro

Roast Beef Ingredients: • 1 beef roast (3-4 pounds) • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 tablespoon fresh rosemary, chopped • 1 tablespoon fresh thyme, chopped • 1/4 cup olive oil • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). • In a bowl, mix minced garlic, chopped rosemary, chopped thyme, olive oil, salt, and pepper. • Place the roast in a roasting pan and cook for 1 hour and 30 minutes until desired doneness. Salmon en Papillote Ingredients: • 4 salmon fillets • 1 lemon, sliced • 1 small onion, sliced • 1 zucchini, sliced • 1/4 cup olive oil • 1 tablespoon fresh dill, chopped • Salt and pepper to taste • Parchment paper Instructions: • Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). • Place packets on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes until salmon is cooked through.

Shrimp and Avocado Salad Ingredients: • 1 cup cooked shrimp, peeled and deveined • 1/2 avocado, diced • 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 2 tablespoons olive oil • 1 tablespoon lemon juice • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the shrimp, avocado, tomatoes, and red onion. Chicken and Veggie Stir-Fry Ingredients: • 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced • 1/2 cup bell pepper, sliced • 1/2 cup broccoli florets • 1/4 cup snap peas • 2 tablespoons soy sauce • 1 tablespoon olive oil • 1 teaspoon sesame oil • Cooked rice for serving Instructions: • In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Black Bean and Corn Salad Ingredients: • 1 can black beans, drained and rinsed • 1 cup corn kernels (fresh or canned) • 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved

Breakfast Sandwich Ingredients: • 1 English muffin, split and toasted • 1 large egg • 1 slice of cheese • 1 slice of ham or bacon • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Cook the egg in a skillet over medium heat, seasoning with salt and pepper. Breakfast Quesadilla Ingredients: • 1 large flour tortilla • 2 large eggs • 1/4 cup shredded cheese • 1/4 cup cooked sausage or bacon • 1/4 cup diced bell pepper • Salsa for serving Instructions: • In a bowl, whisk the eggs and cook them in a skillet over medium heat. Chia Pudding Ingredients: • 1/4 cup chia seeds • 1 cup almond milk • 1 tablespoon honey or maple syrup • 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract • Toppings: fresh fruit, nuts, coconut flakes Instructions: • In a bowl, whisk together chia seeds, almond milk, honey or maple syrup, and vanilla extract. • Assemble the sandwich with the egg, cheese, and ham or bacon between the English muffin halves. • Place the egg mixture on one half of the tortilla and fold the other half over.

Ramen Ingredients: • 4 cups chicken broth • 1/4 cup soy sauce • 2 tablespoons miso paste • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 piece ginger, sliced • 1/2 pound pork belly, sliced • 4 eggs, soft-boiled • 8 ounces ramen noodles • Sliced green onions, nori, and sesame seeds for garnish Instructions: • In a large pot, bring chicken broth, soy sauce, miso paste, minced garlic, and sliced ginger to a boil. Quiche Lorraine Ingredients: • 1 pie crust • 6 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled • 1 small onion, diced • 1 cup grated Gruyère cheese • 3 eggs • 1 cup heavy cream • 1/2 teaspoon salt • 1/4 teaspoon pepper Instructions: • Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). • Divide noodles among bowls, top with broth, pork belly, soft-boiled eggs, sliced green onions, nori, and sesame seeds.

General Tso's Chicken Ingredients: • 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cubed • 1/4 cup cornstarch • 1/4 cup soy sauce • 1/4 cup rice vinegar • 1/4 cup hoisin sauce • 2 tablespoons sugar • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 teaspoon grated ginger • 1/4 cup vegetable oil • Cooked rice for serving • Sliced green onions for garnish Instructions: • In a bowl, toss chicken cubes with cornstarch. Greek Moussaka Ingredients: • 2 large eggplants, sliced • 1 pound ground lamb or beef • 1 small onion, diced • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes • 1/4 cup red wine • 1 teaspoon cinnamon • 1 teaspoon oregano • 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese • 2 tablespoons olive oil • Salt and pepper to taste • 2 cups béchamel sauce Instructions: • Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). • Season eggplant slices with salt and let sit for 30 minutes, then pat dry.

o 1 teaspoon garam masala o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix flour, oil, and water to form a dough, then let rest. Sauerkraut • Ingredients: o 1 head cabbage o 1 tablespoon sea salt o 1 teaspoon caraway seeds • Instructions: o Shred cabbage and mix with sea salt and caraway seeds. o Mix coconut milk, soy sauce, peanut butter, curry powder, and brown sugar in a bowl. Satay • Ingredients: o 1 pound chicken breast o 1/4 cup coconut milk o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 2 tablespoons peanut butter o 1 tablespoon curry powder o 1 tablespoon brown sugar o Skewers • Instructions: o Cut chicken into strips and thread onto skewers. Shakshuka • Ingredients: o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 bell pepper

Rau Muong Xao Toi (Stir-Fried Morning Glory with Garlic) • Ingredients: o 1 pound morning glory o 4 cloves garlic o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 1 tablespoon vegetable oil • Instructions: o Sauté minced garlic in vegetable oil until fragrant. Refried Beans • Ingredients: o 2 cups cooked pinto beans o 1/4 cup lard or vegetable oil o 1 small onion o 1 clove garlic o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Heat lard or oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent. o 1 teaspoon rosemary o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Dice eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomatoes. Rfissa • Ingredients: o 1 pound chicken o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon turmeric o 1 teaspoon ginger

o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix rice flour, coconut milk, water, turmeric, and salt to form a batter. Basturma • Ingredients: o 1 pound beef tenderloin o 1/4 cup paprika o 2 tablespoons cumin o 2 tablespoons fenugreek o 1 tablespoon garlic powder o 1 tablespoon salt • Instructions: o Rub beef with salt and let cure in the refrigerator for 24 hours. Batbout • Ingredients: o 2 1/4 teaspoons active dry yeast o 1 teaspoon sugar o 1 cup warm water o 3 cups flour o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup olive oil • Instructions: o Dissolve yeast and sugar in warm water, let sit until foamy. o Mix flour and salt in a bowl, then add yeast mixture and olive oil. o Heat oil in a pan and pour in a ladle of batter, swirling to coat the pan.

Quinoa Salad Ingredients: • 1 cup cooked quinoa • 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1/2 cucumber, diced • 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 2 tablespoons olive oil • 1 tablespoon lemon juice • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a large bowl, combine the quinoa, tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese. Turkey and Avocado Sandwich Ingredients: • 2 slices whole grain bread • 4 slices turkey breast • 1/2 avocado, sliced • 1/2 cup spinach leaves • 1 tablespoon mustard or mayo Instructions: • Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread. Chicken Caesar Wrap Ingredients: • 1 whole wheat tortilla • 1 cup cooked chicken breast, sliced • 1 cup romaine lettuce, chopped • 2 tablespoons Caesar dressing • 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese • Optional: croutons for extra crunch Instructions: • Lay the tortilla flat and spread the Caesar dressing evenly.

Antipasto • Ingredients: o Assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto) o Cheeses (mozzarella, provolone) o Olives o Marinated vegetables (artichokes, peppers) o Breadsticks • Instructions: o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter. Albondigas • Ingredients: o 1/2 pound ground beef o 1/2 pound ground pork o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs o 1 egg o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 cup tomato sauce • Instructions: o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten egg, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Arancini • Ingredients: o 2 cups cooked risotto o 1/2 cup mozzarella o 1/2 cup flour o 2 eggs o 1 cup breadcrumbs o 1 cup vegetable oil

o 2 tablespoons honey o 1 tablespoon rice wine o 1 teaspoon five-spice powder o 1 teaspoon garlic powder • Instructions: o Mix hoisin sauce, soy sauce, honey, rice wine, five-spice powder, and garlic powder in a bowl. Chiles Rellenos • Ingredients: o 4 poblano peppers o 1 cup shredded cheese o 1/2 cup flour o 4 eggs o 1 cup vegetable oil o 1 cup tomato sauce • Instructions: o Roast peppers until charred, then peel and remove seeds. Chawanmushi • Ingredients: o 2 eggs o 1 cup dashi broth o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 tablespoon mirin o 1/4 cup chicken o 1/4 cup shrimp o 1/4 cup mushrooms • Instructions: o Beat eggs with dashi broth, soy sauce, and mirin.

Chickpea and Avocado Sandwich Ingredients: • 2 slices whole grain bread • 1/2 avocado, mashed • 1/2 cup chickpeas, mashed • 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1 tablespoon olive oil • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine the mashed avocado and chickpeas. Greek Salad Ingredients: • 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1/2 cucumber, diced • 1/4 cup red onion, finely chopped • 1/4 cup black olives, sliced • 1/4 cup feta cheese, crumbled • 2 tablespoons olive oil • 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a large bowl, combine the tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, olives, and feta cheese. Turkey and Cranberry Wrap Ingredients: • 1 whole wheat tortilla • 4 slices turkey breast • 2 tablespoons cranberry sauce • 1/2 cup baby spinach • 1/4 cup shredded carrots Instructions:

Papadum • Ingredients: o 1 cup urad dal flour o 1/4 cup water o 1/2 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix urad dal flour, water, and salt to form a dough. Panzanella • Ingredients: o 4 cups cubed bread o 4 tomatoes o 1 cucumber o 1 small red onion o 1/4 cup basil o 1/4 cup olive oil o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions: o Toast bread cubes until golden. o Mix yogurt, lemon juice, cumin, coriander, garam masala, turmeric, and salt in a bowl.

• In a skillet, cook ground beef or sausage with diced onion and minced garlic until browned. • In a baking dish, layer half the ziti, half the sauce, dollops of ricotta, and half the mozzarella. Baked Ziti Ingredients: • 1 pound ziti pasta • 1 pound ground beef or Italian sausage • 1 small onion, diced • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 jar (24 ounces) marinara sauce • 1 cup ricotta cheese • 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese • 1 teaspoon dried oregano • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Butter Chicken Ingredients: • 1 pound boneless chicken thighs, cubed • 1 cup plain yogurt • 1 tablespoon lemon juice • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 teaspoon grated ginger • 1 teaspoon garam masala • 1 teaspoon turmeric • 1 teaspoon cumin • 1 can (14.5 ounces) tomato puree • 1/2 cup heavy cream • 2 tablespoons butter • Salt and pepper to taste • Chopped cilantro for garnish • Cooked rice or naan for serving Instructions:

Beef Stroganoff Ingredients: • 1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced • 1 small onion, diced • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced • 1 cup beef broth • 1 cup sour cream • 2 tablespoons flour • 2 tablespoons butter • 1 teaspoon paprika • Salt and pepper to taste • Egg noodles or rice for serving Instructions: • In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. • Dredge chicken in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with a mixture of breadcrumbs and grated Parmesan cheese. Chicken Parmesan Ingredients: • 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts • 1 cup breadcrumbs • 1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese • 1 cup marinara sauce • 1 cup mozzarella cheese, shredded • 2 eggs, beaten • 1/2 cup flour • 1/4 cup olive oil • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
